Reviews.Title: sanyo 42 led poor construction and terrible sound quality.
Reviews.Author: mike olson
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my parent's for christmas,I wanted the samsung but it was back ordered so i went with this one.the tv is poorly constructed ,thin housing.the sound on this tv is absolutely horrible.I called the sony tech line with no help. the speaker point's to the back of the tv and no matter how you adjust the sound it is severly muffled.I ended up having to buy an extra auxilary speaker and a special cable($90.00 dollars worth) just to make this tv usable.I have a samsung ,same tv as this with great picture and sound quality for the same price.I wish i would have waited for the back order to be filled.I would not recommend this tv at all.

TV Type: LED
